Name: CzEng 2.0
Description: This corpus is bidirectional, with original texts in English and CzechÂ and accompanying translations. CzEng 2.0 is composed from authentic and synthetic parallel data. The authentic part contains filtered CzEng 1.6 and six additional resources: Europarl, Paracrawl, Common Crawl, News Commentary, Tilde MODEL, Wiki Titles, WikiMatrix, which was downloaded from WMT 2020. The corpus is available for download from a dedicated website.
